credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Page from a drawing book: The Foundry (Pulvis Pyrius)
medium: Pen and ink, brush and gray wash, bistre, on paper
description: Six men are making canons: one is a fireman working in a room in the back; two finish canons with chisel and hammer (one an almost completed canon, the other - a muzzle); two more men on the obverse; the sixth man stands beside a polished cannon holding an oblong object. Metal is streaming from a square hole in the wall in the left central plane; a ladder and a wheel are at right. The caption, near lower center, reads "Fondiera".
name: Drawing
